dcterms:creator: M. Mohler
R. Bunescu
R. Mihalcea
dcterms:description: Mohler dataset comprises of questions and answers in computer science domain. The goal of the dataset is to evaluate the model in grading the students’ answers by comparing them with the evaluator’s desired answer. It constitutes 2273 answers from 10 assignments and 2 examinations, collected from 31 students for 80 different questions.
dcterms:title: Mohler dataset
